add_new_validate_require.description: Validation message displayed when the Domain (URI) field is empty

add_new_validate_min_length.message: Please enter the Domain (URI) with at least 3 characters.
add_new_validate_min_length.description: Validation message displayed when the Domain (URI) field has fewer than 3 characters

add_new_validate_invalid_domain.description: Validation message displayed when the Domain (URI) entered is invalid

add_new_validate_card_name_required.description: Validation message displayed when the Card Name field is empty

add_new_validate_card_name_length.message: Card name must be less than 256 characters
add_new_validate_card_name_length.description: Validation message displayed when the Card Name field exceeds 255 characters

add_new_validate_cardholder_length.message: Cardholder must be less than 256 characters
add_new_validate_cardholder_length.description: Validation message displayed when the Cardholder field exceeds 255 characters

add_new_validate_card_number_invalid.description: Validation message displayed when the Card Number field is invalid

add_new_validate_expiration_date_invalid.description: Validation message displayed when the Expiration Date field is invalid

add_new_validate_security_code_invalid.message: Security code must be 3 or 4 digits
add_new_validate_security_code_invalid.description: Validation message displayed when the Security Code field is invalid

add_new_security_code_too_long.description: Warning message displayed when the security code has 4 digits but the detected card issuer requires 3 digits

add_new_header.message:
Adding a new ITEM to 
2FAS Pass
add_new_header.description: Header for the section to add a new item

add_new_subheader.message: Start the process here and continue in the mobile app.
add_new_subheader.description: Subheader explaining that the process starts in the browser and continues in the mobile app

add_new_learn_more_tooltip_header.description: Header for the tooltip explaining security measures

add_new_learn_more_tooltip_content_1.message: By default, we do not ask you to enter your username and create a password using the Browser Extension. Instead, we encourage you to choose a username and generate a password directly in the mobile application.
add_new_learn_more_tooltip_content_1.description: Explains the default security approach of creating login and password in the mobile app

add_new_learn_more_tooltip_content_2.message: You can enter your username and/or password in the form above and save it to your Vault in the mobile app.
add_new_learn_more_tooltip_content_2.description: Explains the option to enter login and password in the browser extension and save it to the mobile app
